import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./ShopPage.css"; const ShopPage = () => { const[tempdata,setTempdata]=useState([]) const [search, setSearch] = useState("") const searchHandler = (e) => { setSearch(e.target.value) } const getData=(image,title,price)=>{ let tempData=[image,title,price] setTempdata(item=> [1, ...tempData ]) } const[product,setProducts]=useState([]) const[visible,setVisible]=useState(12) const showMoreItems=()=>{ setVisible(prevValue=>prevValue+12) } const filteredProducst = product.filter(productss => products.title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/card') .then(res => setProducts(res.data.cards)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) return (
All Products Women Men Bags Shoes Watches

Filter

Sort By
Default Popularity Average rating Newness Price: Low to High Price: High to Low
Price
All $0.00 - $50.00 $50.00 - $100.00 $100.00 - $150.00 $150.00 - $200.00 $200.00+
Color
Black Blue Grey Green Red White
Tags
Fashion Lifestyle Denim Streetstyle Crafts
{filteredProducst&&filteredProducst.slice(0,visible).map((productss)=>(
getData(productss.image, productss.title, productss.price)}>ADD TO CARD
{productss.title} {productss.price} AZN
))}
LOAD MORE
); }; export default ShopPage;
